version_description:
- Improved library and document state preservation
- Fixed contextual menu appearance in notes
- Fixed potential Mendeley authorization issue
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

- Fix Zotero notes formatting
- Fix Publisher name when importing PDF to Zotero
- Improve Zotero web importer feedback
- Improve app stability

Note: we recommend connecting to a Wi-Fi network before running this update for the first time.

- Improved Mendeley synchronization (requires a one-time automatic migration)
- Rich notes for Mendeley documents
- Fixed drawing PDF annotations
- Bug fixes

- Editable group documents (metadata, notes, PDF annotations)
- Clarified Copy/Move interface for Inbox documents
- Persistent PDF notes and annotations for Mendeley
- Refined settings interface
- Fixed document publication sync for Mendeley
- Fixed authors search for Mendeley
- Fixed Copy/Move popover position when presented at the bottom of the screen
- Minor bug fixes

- Add Sort Documents by Added Date for Zotero
- Fix network reliability issues
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes for group documents with WebDAV server configured

- Improve PDF engine
- Adjust speech synthesizer speed
- Export by mail with additional annotations types
- Fix sharing new annotations
- Fix annotations gestures on iPhone
- Fix special characters for Zotero collections names
- Bug fixes

- View, edit, and annotate PDFs with other apps (requires in-app purchase)
- All annotations, including highlights, now require in-app purchase
- iPad Pro support
- Create and Delete Folders
- Bug fixes

- Support iPad multitasking (Slide Over, Split View)
- Update PDF engine
- Adjust PDF speech synthesizer speed
- Fix PDF rendering bug with Chinese characters
- Now requires iOS 8

- Add “Share...” action to PDF text selection
- Update PDF engine
- Fix PDF annotations selection inconsistencies
- Fix crash when editing documents info on iPhone

- Change PDF notes annotations font
- Fix view/edit journal info for Zotero documents

- Improve scrolling with Zotero importer
- Improve presenting documents with partially missing files
- Disable scroll to top shortcut for PDFs

- Update document info from new DOI
- Editable DOI/ISSN/arXiv ID/Citation Key for Mendeley Journal Articles
- Editable ISSN for Zotero Journal Articles
- Bug fixes
- Fix PDF screen not responding

- Restore PDF annotations contextual menu items
- Preserve last name/first name distinction when analyzing documents metadata
- Preserve “creator type” field for Zotero documents
- Fix crash when trying to open non-HTTP(S) URLs
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

- Updated PDF annotation tools
- Interface improvements
